RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONMOUTH PARK RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 72. Optional Claiming Purse 71875. FOR REGISTERED NEW JERSEY BREDS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since Jun e 28 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 28 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $30,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEL PENSIERO tracked close up on the inside, angled out entering the stretch, rallied three wide in the lane, closed steadily outside, reached the front passed the sixteenth marker and drew clear. AMAZING GRACES JOY vied two wide for the lead, dueled on the turn, dug in gamely in the stretch run, then yielded to the winner. ROB THE TREASURE raced off the pace inside, moved up between horses entering the stretch, rallied mildly outside and got the nod for third. DELIGHTFUL AVA chased between rivals, rallied mildly in the stretch run and just missed for third. FIXED ODDS vied inside for the lead, dueled on the turn and weakened. SHERRY ORIENTAL was off slowly and steadied, outrun early and closed belatedly on the rail. POLITELY CROWNED chased three wide, came four wide into the lane and tired. SEA MAIDEN chased three wide and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Bel Pensiero
ENTRY.OWNER: Hudson Stable LLC Let It Ride Equine Holdings and A R M Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, angled out into lane, rallied 3w, led past 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Delightful Ava
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between, mild rally, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Fixed Odds
ENTRY.OWNER: Imaginary Stables Ellis Glenn K and M3 Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, dueled turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Amazing Graces Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2w, dueled turn, dug in gamely stretch, yielded

ENTRY.NAME: Sherry Oriental
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly steadied, outrun early, belatedly on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Politely Crowned
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, 4w into lane, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Rob the Treasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, between into lane, mild rally outside, got 3d

ENTRY.NAME: Sea Maiden
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONMOUTH PARK RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 26500. (PLUS UP TO 40% NJB) FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD OR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, For Each $ 1,000 To $14,000 1 lb. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ASTONISHING ANABEL stalked the early lead, bid two wide on the turn, dueled between rivals turning for home, dug in gamely in the stretch run, dueled through the final furlong and prevailed in a driving finish. WHEELINGNDEALING stalked three wide, bid three wide on the turn, dueled into the stretch, dug in gamely between horses in the final furlong and got the nod for second. BELMAR SUMMER raced three wide off the pace, moved up three wide on the turn, rallied four wide into the stretch, dueled through the lane and dug in gamely outside to the finish. BOSS LIKE BETH chased on the inside, saved ground on the turn, rallied inside in the stretch and was gaining late. LONDON LADY chased between rivals early on and had no rally. GUN OF GOLD set the pace on the inside, dueled on the turn, dug in to midstretch and faded. COAL MINE raced off the pace inside and did not factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Gun of Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, dueled turn, dug in, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Coal Mine
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Like Beth
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, inside turn, rallied inside, gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Belmar Summer
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w off pace, advanced 3w turn, rallied 4w into lane, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: London Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Astonishing Anabel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, bid 2w turn, dueled, stretch duel, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Wheelingndealing
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, bid 3w turn, dueled into lane, dug in gamely between

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONMOUTH PARK RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 26000. (PLUS UP TO 40% NJB) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 28. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, For Each $500 To $7,000 1 lb. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligi bility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICY STORM raced off the pace inside, advanced three wide on the far turn, rallied four wide into the stretch, angled in behind HONOR THE FLEET passing the eighth pole, quickly took over, pulled away and was ridden out. HONOR THE FLEET set the pace racing with a clear lead, showed the way on his own around the far turn, drifted out after left handed encouragement coming to the furlong marker, then weakened and held second. CORKMAN stalked two wide, chased three wide on the far turn, then rallied mildly on the rail in the stretch. THE JONES BOY tracked inside, chased inside on the far turn and weakened. INDIAN BUZZ raced three wide early, stalked close up outside, chased on the far turn and faded. THE METHOD was steadied soon after the start, then outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: The Jones Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, chased inside far turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Corkman
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2w, chased 3w far turn, mild rally on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Honor the Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear, drifted out 1/8 pole, weakened, held 2d

ENTRY.NAME: The Method
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied early, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Buzz
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w early, stalked outside, chased far turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, advanced 3w turn, rally 4w,angled in,pulled away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONMOUTH PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 26500. (PLUS UP TO 40% NJB) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 28. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, For Each $500 To $7,000 1 lb. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligi bility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRENA'S STAR set the pace on the inside, opened up a clear lead on the turn, responded when roused in the stretch run, then held well late under energetic handling. SOUPER FLY OVER raced off the pace between rivals, chased on the turn, came five wide into the lane, rallied outside, was floated wide passing the sixteenth marker and closed well late for second. SNEAKINESS chased outside, then two wide on the turn, rallied between rivals in the stretch drive and was outkicked for the place spot. PUDDING raced off the pace inside, chased on the turn, angled out sharply at the eighth pole, drifted out and rallied mildly. DIZZY GILLESPIE raced three wide off the pace, chased on the turn, came six wide into the lane and tired. SMALL REASON chased close up on the inside, chased on the turn and tired. JOHNNY OIL was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Pudding
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, chased turn, angled out 1/8, drifted out 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Drena's Star
ENTRY.OWNER: Brad's Equine Adventure and Tri-Star Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, clear, responded, held well under urging

ENTRY.NAME: Johnny Oil
ENTRY.OWNER: King Clarence B and Williams Joseph M
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Small Reason
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, chased turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Fly Over
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace between, 5w into lane, floated wide 1/16,rallied outside

ENTRY.NAME: Dizzy Gillespie
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w off pace, chased turn, 6w into lane, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sneakiness
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside, chased 2w turn, rallied between, outkicked 2d

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONMOUTH PARK RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 91. Allowance Purse 57500. (PLUS UP TO 40% NJB) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $17,000 ONCE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winner s Of A Race Since June 28 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 28 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $30,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALL THAT MAGIC set the pace on the inside, shook free on the turn, responded when roused for the stretch run, drew off and was ridden out. MUSICAL DESIGN stalked close up outside early on, chased two wide on the turn and rallied for second in the stretch drive. MISS SAKAMOTO raced three wide off the pace, continued three wide at the quarter pole and rallied mildly outside. WORLD TRAVELER raced off the pace inside, came two wide into the lane and gained mildly inside. QUEEN KARIMA chased between rivals, moved inside on the turn and weakened in the lane. SADIE BABY was outrun early, came three wide into the lane and improved her position. ATHENA'S WISDOM tracked close up on the inside, chased inside on the turn, dug in and weakened in the final furlong. EXPLOSIVE EXCHANGE raced off the pace inside and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Athena's Wisdom
ENTRY.OWNER: JPG 2 LLC Majestic Racing Inc and Winning Stables Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, chased turn, dug in, weakened final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Sadie Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, 3w into lane, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Queen Karima
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between, inside turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: All That Magic
ENTRY.OWNER: Pewter Stable and Spedale Family Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, shook free, responded, drew off, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Explosive Exchange
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: World Traveler
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, 2w into lane, mild gain inside

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Sakamoto
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w off pace, 3w 1/4, mild rally outside

ENTRY.NAME: Musical Design
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, chased 2w turn, rallied for place

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of SI

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONMOUTH PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 26150. (PLUS UP TO 40% NJB) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, For Each $1,000 To $14,000 1 lb. (Races Where Entere d For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOVIAL hopped at the start and was off last, moved up three wide on the turn, rallied five wide into the stretch, swept to the front nearing the furlong marker and drew clear under urging. MUST BE LOVE showed good early speed outside, then dueled two wide for command, dueled into the stretch, dug in gamely past the furlong marker and came up second best. FORTY STRIPES raced close up early on between rivals, then settled off the pace, dropped back on the turn, came three wide into the lane and finished well late. PRACTICAL WAY raced off the pace, chased between rivals on the turn and into the stretch, then rallied mildly. RECKLESS PLACE broke a step slow, chased on the inside, rallied on the rail turning for home, made a bid and weakened. SOUPER ROYAL MOON stalked four wide early, moved up three wide on the turn, made a bid and then flattened out. AWESOMEBROTHERBILL vied for the early lead racing in the two path, then chased and faded. BAYOU SHACK pulled his way to the front racing between horses in the opened quarter mile, then dueled inside on the turn and gave way in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless Place
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, chased inside, rail rally, bid, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Forty Stripes
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up early between foes, off pace, late rally

ENTRY.NAME: Awesomebrotherbill
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early 2-path, chased, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Must Be Love
ENTRY.OWNER: Pewter Stable and Greco, Thomas A.
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed outside, dueled 2w turn, dug in gamely stretch, 2d best

ENTRY.NAME: Jovial
ENTRY.OWNER: Fanelli John and Longball Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, off last, 3w turn, rallied 5w into lane, swept to front

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Wayne Lyster, Gray Lyster & Bryan Lyster

ENTRY.NAME: Practical Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, chased between turn, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Shack
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled to front between foes, dueled inside turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Royal Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4w, 3w turn, bid, flattened out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONMOUTH PARK RACE 7 1 1/16M Turf CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 62500. (PLUS UP TO 40% NJB) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. No n-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 28 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Races Where Entered For $22,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ST ANTHONY tracked close up on the inside, continued to track the leader while saving ground on the far turn, bid two wide at the quarter pole, took over in upper stretch, kicked clear under urging and was kept to the task. OFFALY COOL stalked two wide, moved up three wide on the far turn, rallied into the second spot and dug in gamely late to hold that position. BE HERE trailed in the early stages, saved ground, came three wide into the lane, closed well late outside and got third. OCEANS MAP was a bit fractious in the gate, raced off the pace inside, then two wide, chased on the far turn and rallied late between horses. SOUPER ENERGIZER raced off the pace with an inside trip and failed to threaten. NIGHT JUMPER vied inside for the early lead, then took over to set the pace, showed the way on the far turn, dueled with the winner into the stretch and weakened. MEGACITY was fractious in the gate, vied two wide for the early lead, then stalked, chased and faded. IRISH EXIT raced two wide off the pace and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Night Jumper
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside early, took over, dueled into lane, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: St Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, bid 2w 1/4, took over, kicked clear, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Be Here
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, inside, 3w into lane, late rally outside

ENTRY.NAME: Megacity
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, vied 2w early, stalked, chased, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Offaly Cool
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2w, 3w far turn, rallied into 2nd,dug in gamely for place

ENTRY.NAME: Oceans Map
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit fractious, off pace inside, 2w, late rally between

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Energizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside trip, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Exit
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2w off pace, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MONMOUTH PARK RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 20200. (PLUS UP TO 40% NJB) FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD OR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 28 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500, For Each $5 00 To $6,500 1 lb.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANCE STEP vied for the early lead, then took back into a stalking position, bid three wide nearing the quarter pole, took over and drew clear under urging. STEPHANIE MY LOVE raced off the pace inside, moved up on the turn, rallied four wide into the stretch and came up second best. BINOCHE dueled three wide for the early lead, dueled two wide on the turn and tired. ANGELIC GAL dueled between rivals early on, then chased on the turn, came three wide into the lane and tired. COMODA was outrun. CUPIDS PAYDAY dueled inside in a contested early pace, dueled on the turn, was injured at the quarter pole, pulled up and vanned off. After a Stewards' Inquiry, the race was declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Stephanie My Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, rallied 4w into lane, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Cupids Payday
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, dueled turn, injured 1/4, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Comoda
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Angelic Gal
ENTRY.OWNER: Kathleen O'Connell Racing Stable Inc and Talbot Roger P
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled between early, chased turn, 3w into lane, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Dance Step
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early, stalked, 3w bid 1/4, took over, drew clear, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Binoche
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3w, dueled 2w turn, tired, held 3rd
